name: (DEMO)Escape From Siak
description:
INTRODUCTION

In a peaceful village, two siblings lived together, a brother and a sister. They were inseparable and always looked out for each other. However, their happy lives were shattered when the younger sister was kidnapped by a ferocious monster.

The older brother was devastated and determined to rescue his sister. He heard that the monster had taken her to a castle filled with dangerous creatures. Without hesitation, the brave brother set out on a dangerous journey to save his beloved sister.

Control

A  = Left , D = Right , W = Enter the door
